title: the ping sucks since the 2nd day of urf
body:
i used to have 90-110 ms in a normal day .. 
NOW from 2 days ago i started to get 300-600 ms and its hard even to start the match up screen ..
if any one have the same shity situation,pls share it.
ty

replies.body: If you're getting random ping spikes through multiple games, I'd check out our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which can analyze your network logs and provide some potential solutions to the problems it finds.  Let me know if it helps or you find it useful!

i did every thing i could ,i even downloaded Hextech Repair Tool ... it did nothing ..
and i have made a request with my network analysis and tracert.txt .. and im still waiting for a solution 
im from Egypt btw my ISP is etisalat adsl if u can check if there is a problem with my isp and riot server pls let me know.

Hmm...If you've already tried all the steps listed in that article, I'd go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your specific situation and see what's going on.
i did send a ticket 7 hours ago and no respond yet.
